Room.Name: Milsene Museum's Theatre of Doom
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small theatre-like room with a front stage to the north.
Room.LongDescription: The set is very gothic and looks like it's inhabited by ghosts and goblins. Perhaps even worse. The stage and the set are just props that you can't seem to move, but everything around you seems to be moving. Chairs rattle, tables move and small drinking glasses tumble to the ground and shatter. A very scary place, indeed.
